title: Cactopus, I love you...
body:
http://image.prntscr.com/image/c6daa9ac526046e78d05f39f754d85a7.png

I don't think I enjoyed a Rioter's comments this much before. Never leave.

EDIT: Senpai notice me

EDIT: SENPAI NOTICED ME

replies.body: You're a golden human. Thank you for making my night :)

:D

*waits for fangirling to subside*

Just don't tell King Odarth I said I love you. He might get jealous. :3
He'll exile you like what he did to {{champion:92}}  if any of you get the joke.
You guys need more employees like you, makes me think a bit brighter about riot again :') apart from the lucian nerfs, i will never forgive the person who ever nerfed him so much >:'(
I'll not forgive whoever nerfed Vladimir so much and on top of that only nerfed Irelia once {cries in corner}
He confirmed that Graves vapes and that it is cannon.

>cannon

http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b25/presidentshinra/funny-puns-i-had-to-google-headcanon-for-this-to-make-sense_zps5d7782a0.png
I wonder how her.... you know feels, fill it in -_-
And that's why Cactopus is best

Hey Cactopus who made Tahm Kench's lines. BrickyOrchid8 said he'd come over to Riot HQ to personally deliver cookies to him because those lines are gold
As far as the skin is concerned, Riot did have a Bowser skin for {{champion:33}} before. but due to copyright issues, it is no longer available :(
King Rammus was a gift to beta testers. It not being sold had nothing to do with copyright.
